attributes.action: Phase out the selling of non energy saving lightbulbs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The use of non energy saving lightbulbs in all cases is a waste of energy. I believe they should be removed from shelves over the next 12 months. Manufacturers should be made to only produce energy efficient bulbs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
